Reviews.Title: Great little watch
Reviews.Author: Jon "Jon"
Reviews.Content: This is, without a doubt, my favorite watch of all time.  It's not perfect, but what watch ever will be?  First off, I've used the phone feature only once.  My primary reason for considering this watchphone isn't for the phone feature but rather the MP3 player+Bluetooth capability.  I use it for working out at the gym, I don't have to strap my iphone to my arm, my shorts, etc.  Instead, I just turn on my Motorola S9 Bluetooth stereo headset and I'm good.  Yes, it does have high-quality bluetooth stereo support.  However, you'll find that your watch should be within very close proximity of the headphones.  How close, well... within just a few feet (not the 33ft. you'd expect).  As an MP3 player, it's good (not great).  As a camera, it's good (not great) since the pictures are 640x480 (VGA) resolution.  As a video recorder, it's bad (resolution is really bad).  As a video player, it's so-so (I've yet to figure out how to fast-forward a movie).  But, if you look at all the features packed into this small package and the "coolness" factor, I can't help but give it a 5 star overall.I love it, it's not perfect but the makers of this watch are definitely on the right track.  Through incremental improvements in future models, this will be an awesome watch that everyone will someday want.  As it is today, it's a slick little device.  If you like high-tech watches, you probably can't find much better than this one today.

Reviews.Title: Fake reviews?
Reviews.Author: John3:16
Reviews.Content: The previous reviews seem very contrived. It seems strange that English would be the second language for all the other reviewers.This watch received poor reviews on other websites. Buyer beware.  Amazon should check the IP address of people posting reviews to eliminate Chinese manufacturers from submitting false reviews to pump up their products.

Reviews.Title: A Great Attempt
Reviews.Author: Keyeno
Reviews.Content: I would first like to say that I very much like this product. But it doesn't go without it's pros and cons.Pros: Very Adjustable Wristband, Durable, Sleek, Good Interface.Cons: Product Image is Not Exact, User Manual is a Little Confusing, Lack of Customization, Very Quiet Speaker.Now for the details.This is day one for me and the watch. I'm not used to watches over all so it makes my wrist itch a little; but despite a somewhat bulky screen, sits well on my wrist and doesn't shuffle around too much. Although I'm on the very last notch since my wrists are small. This is probably better fit for most men.Another issue is customization. The particular theme on the phone was aimed towards women and I have no clue how to look like what is in the image.This product is also not built to be compatible with most PCs and there are currently no working drivers/sync centers for Vista/Windows 7. But I'm used to that since my old phone couldn't either. It would also be nice if there was a product site for this watch.All in all, I like it for its portability, and I would recommend this product to someone that likes the simplicity with dealing with less features than what most competing cell/smart phone companies are doing now. It's not a good geek toy but will definitely get you some wows from those who aren't so tech savvy.Thank you for reading!

Reviews.Title: marks cellfone wristwatch review
Reviews.Author: Marks review
Reviews.Content: i chose the rating because the watch looked cool plus has lots of things one can use on it beside.downloading ringtones

Reviews.Content: does not work here in Germany so not worth buying it if it doesnt work in all countries price ok

Reviews.Title: Non working gadget.
Reviews.Author: Sapt
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money on this. It's good for nothing. The screen doesn't load at all, remains blank.I received this and within 2 hours I initiated return.

Reviews.Title: The worst watch phone ever seen.
Reviews.Author: megatokay
Reviews.Content: after 2 day . It did not work anymore.  It did not recognize the SIM card anymore and I tried every thing to fix it, but I did can't .

Reviews.Title: I like it but we don't see eye to eye.
Reviews.Author: H. L. Wright
Reviews.Content: 1)  It always wants to change my time zone.  even when I say yes or no, it comes up later asking me to change or not.2)  There seems to be some issue with the phone book.  I couldn't transfer from my old phone and it doesn't look up properly.3)  I need to use my blue tooth headset or sometimes can't hear the other party though I haven't messed with the volume.4)  The keypad for name entry is small enough that even with a stylus it is easy to make misteaks and have to go back.It works reliably and I have no issues with operation.  I haven't really used the FM receiver much or other features.  The headset does allow me to listen to music or phone calls which is nice but be careful not to catch the cord or ouch yanking your ear.  I am hopeful there will be an update for the software that will make it more user friendly but can't find much support so far.  Maybe this will get a yelp from somebody.

Reviews.Title: I love it, unique type of phone a "must have"
Reviews.Author: Suriname
Reviews.Content: I love it, unique type of phone.Although it looks funny if you put your hand to your ear.. imagine that.I also bought an universal bluetooth earpeace but sadly did not work, I have to try another brand then.Got a lot of compliments and it is a "must have"

Reviews.Title: Good article
Reviews.Author: Oscar Armando Vasquez
Reviews.Content: It is a good article, novel. For the price I bought it I agree with the tools and utility brings I can provide.

Reviews.Title: A little bulky.
Reviews.Author: EddieB
Reviews.Content: It would be good to have the charger port on the batteries or a battery charger separate from the watch. It says clear on the instruction not to use it while charging therefore if you run out of power you'll also run out of time. It is a little bulky, my wrists are not big but they aren't small either a still a little big for my wrist. Read the entire User manual before started to play with it it is very easy to lock it and very difficult to unlocked.No even a month of use and the touch screen stopped working. When asked for replacement PGD wanted me to buy another so we both save in shipping "so they said". Anyway I ended with just a watch cause could not get it work as cellphone anymore.Don't waste your time and money with the watch or the company that sales it (PGD GROUP).

Reviews.Title: Flimsy
Reviews.Author: John Nery
Reviews.Content: During the first day of use I rubbed the front of the watch across my plastic case technician toolbox.  The front cover fell off.  I picked the front cover and buttons off the floor, put it back together and sent the watch back.Might be ok for use by an accountant or librarian.Concept is good but needs a more robust shell.

Reviews.Title: watch/cell phone has worked perfectly since purchase, but the last month the screen has become grainy and sometiomes
Reviews.Author: EDWARD VIGIL
Reviews.Content: Ok, but screen has become grainy and sometimes goes blank ! It happens more than before now. What do I do? Is there a fix for this that is warrentied?

Reviews.Title: Broken port
Reviews.Author: Karla C
Reviews.Content: I got at time, but the Charging port was broken, it was a gift and  i felt so ashamed when the b day boy told me the phone does not load because the port has something broke..

Reviews.Title: very satisfied but...
Reviews.Author: dman
Reviews.Content: Just because it was made in China, I wonder if the watch will last thru to new year:). But very satisfied I must say. Have patients, read the manual. More for the tech savy recommended

Reviews.Title: Nice at First
Reviews.Author: Bee Kaye
Reviews.Content: I bought this watch phone not expecting much from it. When I receive it, I did blow me away. The functions worked great, the bluetooth was clear and connected easily. The materials were plastic but held up very well. The only problem I have had is it will not charge anymore. I had it for about 9 months, I didn't use it everyday, but last week, I think it died. When the battery went dead, I put in the additional battery and it would not turn on. I even bought another charger for it and still it would not charge. Overall, I think it was intended to last about 6-9 months. Would I buy it again, only if I had money to throw away. One day I hope they improve on the idea of this watch phone.

Reviews.Title: Lacking Customer Support
Reviews.Author: Basserm
Reviews.Content: I have requested details on ordering replacement batteries from the manufacturer several times,regrettably I have not any response,the watch is useless without good batteries

Reviews.Title: Watch phone
Reviews.Author: Loudger
Reviews.Content: The watch is not the same as the one at the pic.The one I receieved is from China design and the configuration is not the saem.

Reviews.Title: Simple & working
Reviews.Author: mahmoud mohab elsawaf
Reviews.Content: It is Nice & Accessible -very simple -easy to use - dual sim to use two lines- rubber is water safe-

Reviews.Title: user manuel  so so !
Reviews.Author: marcelino
Reviews.Content: The  watch  is  flimsy  , when i took it out the box the screen  frame came out  .i did put it back on but was not sure it would stay on if i wear the watch.try 3 different sims card  and could not make a callso not very happy with it

Reviews.Title: product/ service great
Reviews.Author: Dave Jewett
Reviews.Content: I am retired and wanted an convenient way to carry my cell phone. What better way than a wrist watch and cell phone combination. Based on the first reviewer and other information, I selected this one. The watch/cell phone along with some valuable assistance from customer service fit my purpose to a T. My advice to others interested is to view the Youtube - and if you purchase, it provides a good instruction manual.

Reviews.Title: Q8 Dual Sim Card Dual Standby Watch Cell Phone Mobile Quad Band Touch..
Reviews.Author: mohammad
Reviews.Content: I like this product because it has a good criteria and it also can make users become comfortable when using..

Reviews.Title: Great Watch!!
Reviews.Author: Service member
Reviews.Content: I have to admit I like all kinds of gagets! But this watch is the greatest! I travel all over Europe and the Middle East and always have someone asking me about the watch when they hear it ringing or hearing me talking to my watch and realize it's a cell phone.My last travel I was on Emirate Airlines and my watch was ringing, when the flight attendent from Bulgaria asked to please turn off my cell phone. I took my watch off and turn off my phone. She was very impressed and talk to me every chance she got. Well, when we arrived in Germany she asked me for my number. Since I was in Germany, Anyway long story short.... Germany was great!!!  It nice to have James Bond gagets! You never know who you meet and finds you interesting. GOOD Luck!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Dual Sim Card Dual Standby
This quad-band phone will work on GSM network frequencies 850/900/1800/1900 MHz
Easy-to-use and responsive touchscreen allows for smooth navigating
Wristband has stylus holder + stylus
ProductInfo.Name: Q8 Dual Sim Card Dual Standby Watch Cell Phone Mobile Quad Band Touch Screen Mp3/4 with Keypad
